title: Victor .O. Oseji
text:
Services

As an exprienced business data analyst and data scientist, my goal is to leverage advanced analytics to unearth actionable insights that drive tangible business growth, optimizing processes, enhancing customer experiences, and maximizing ROI
I am experienced in machine learning, supervised and unsupervised algorithms and use data visualization techniques to present the results. I use SQL, R, Python, PowerBI for my data projects.












Data Analysis

I specialize in unlocking data's power across ecommerce, FMCG, and pharmaceuticals, transforming it into crucial insights that empower informed decisions, guide through challenges, and drive business growth

(
examples
)











Data Visualization

As an experienced data scientist, I specialize in comprehensive data analysis and impactful visualization using tools like Excel, R Shiny, Quarto, R Markdown, and PowerBI to empower stakeholders in making well-informed decisions

(
examples
)














Machine Learning

I am a skilled data scientist experienced in using advanced machine learning to predict trends, extract insights from complex data, and drive growth through data-driven strategies for competitive advantage in dynamic markets

(
examples
)












Programming

I have a versatile skill set, excelling in R and proficient in Python, JavaScript, DAX, and SQL, with a proven history of deriving insights from complex datasets to drive impactful data-driven decisions across various domains, including consumer behavior analysis, supply chain optimization, and drug development

(
examples
)














Collaboration

I excel in extracting valuable insights from complex datasets and effectively translating them into actionable business strategies, enabling informed cross-domain decisions and fostering cohesive teamwork towards shared objectives.7

(
examples
)












Programming

Before and during data related projects, I give advice on the progress of the project and I coach data analysts.

title: Victor .O. Oseji
text:
Twitter LinkedIn Github Email



I am a seasoned data scientist with a rich and diverse background spanning over six years in the analytics field. My journey began with a solid foundation in Pure and Applied Chemistry, which ignited my passion for understanding intricate systems. Building upon that, I pursued an MBA, enhancing my ability to bridge the gap between technical insights and strategic business decisions.
My career has seen me excel across multiple industries, from the dynamic realm of e-commerce, where I honed my skills as a BI Analyst, to the fast-moving consumer goods and pharmaceutical sectors, where I thrived as a Business Data Analyst. This breadth of experience has not only broadened my perspective but also reinforced my belief in the transformative power of data.
Proficient in R and comfortable with Python, SQL, Power BI, and JavaScript, I possess a versatile toolkit that enables me to uncover meaningful insights and craft impactful solutions. My understanding of machine learning theory and concepts equips me to harness data’s full potential, driving innovation and growth.


What truly fuels my passion is the collaborative process. I revel in working alongside diverse teams to craft exceptional solutions that not only address complex challenges but also unlock new opportunities. I firmly believe that data holds the key to unlocking a world of possibilities for individuals and businesses alike. It’s this belief that propels me forward, igniting my drive to continually push boundaries and create outstanding outcomes.
In a rapidly evolving data-driven landscape, I stand ready to leverage my skills, experience, and insatiable curiosity to drive excellence and innovation. Let’s harness the power of data together and create a brighter, more insightful future.
